FILE: cm101165v11.0.txt
DYAD: Venezuela - Uruguay

PS: 20120731-20170805 .75 20170806-20209999 .5

PS-UPDATE2020:MERCOSUR dyad, Revision based on a new relationship rule that when a state exits a REI, the REI is the only basis for a relationship with a given other state, and the peace scale coding is not .5, then the relationship continues for 5 years and is coded as negative peace (.5) and then the relationship ends thereafter.

PSNOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220227
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220227
